example.text: 8 million jobs lost and veterans and seniors losing their earned benefits. That’s the real impact of defaulting on our debt. We must protect the full faith and credit of the United States. [[url]]

When both parents take leave, it leads to better outcomes for everyone, and it's good for workers and businesses. This week, our bipartisan working group met with business leaders to discuss their role in the effort to increase access to paid family leave. [[url]]
Good news: we’re continuing to make needed progress to lower inflation. Our work continues to lower everyday costs for families. [[url]]

Eight lives were taken from us in Allen, including three children. Despite the deep pain I feel alongside every Texan, I believe it doesn’t have to be this way. I know we can pass common sense solutions to save lives. Watch my speech from last night on the House floor. [[url]]

Taiwan's considerable contributions to global health are undeniable and China's attempts to exclude them undermines what the World Health Organization stands for. I join [[user]] in calling on [[user]] to invite Taiwan as an observer to the World Health Assembly. [[url]]

Our elections should never be subject to subversion, interference, or the whims of partisan politicians. That’s why we must do all we can to protect free and fair elections. Proud to introduce this legislation with [[user]]. [[url]]
